ModMetaData.name: Combat expansion! Prosthetics and Organs by Kkokoros!
ModMetaData.author: Kkokoros
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the ability to craft combat prosthetics.
Adds 5 Tiers of artificial combat prosthetics: T0: (35%)Wooden Replacements T1: (70%)Artificial Replacements T2: (120%)Bionic Replacements T3: (140%)Advanced Bionic Replacements T4: (150%)Ultra Bionic Replacements
Includes Replacements for: Arms(shoulders - claws, built-in autopistol, built-in EMP launcher, built-in incendiary launcher, built-in smoke launcher), Jaw(fire breath)
Adds apparel: Suicide vest(testing)
Languages added: -English
Fire textures used from https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2723801948
Let me know what should I add next!
If you see any errors, issues or what I should rebalance. let me know in the comments.
